name: Novolink
0:
”Alexa,turn on the bedroom light.”
”Alexa,turn off the bedroom light.”
”Alexa,set the bedroom light to red.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Your festive celebrations will get even livelier when you combine Novolink RGB string lights with the convenience of Alexa! Illuminate your event with simple on and off commands, and when you’re setting the mood and theme of a dance party, romantic interlude, or holiday celebration, adjust the brightness, temperature and color of the lights to complete your scene!

Follow the steps to enable Novolink Skill：
1. Download Novolink LS App, register an account and add devices
2. Open the Alexa App and click "ENABLE TO USE"
3. Follow the instructions on the page to complete binding
